content:
Hello please clarify me

I receive HL7 V2.6 messages in accordance with the IHE-PCD01 profile (vital signs) from multi-parameter monitors. There are 22 OBX segments ...

Should I turn this message into a DiagnosticReport or individual resources such as Observation?

I see many options for this case .... But which one should we adopt?

Each of the vital sign Observations should be represented according to their respective vital sign profile. That means in most cases, 1 OBX = 1 Observation, though for blood pressure, you'll end up combining multiple OBXs into a single blood pressure. I'm not familiar with IHE-PCD01, so I'm not sure whether you'll end up with a DiagnosticReport or not - @John Moehrke ?
